Title: Finding Judas
Plot: House takes the case of a young girl who has been diagnosed with pancreatitis. When he takes her divorced parents to court to force them to allow treatment because they can't agree, the judge awards guardianship of the girl to Cuddy. Meanwhile, Tritter continues his strategy to force House to admit to his drug use by offering one of the team members a deal.
GuestStars: Jordana Capra, Jodi Long, Paula Cale, Christopher Gartin, Alyssa Shafer
